title: DinnerBone&Searge: GDC的第一天
author: Smokey_Days
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Smokey_Days 于 2017-3-2 11:58 编辑 
这里是Smokey_Days给大家带来MojangAB成员在GDC展会期间的情况
DinnerBone:
I'm getting better. I think. I'm more willing to admit my issue, at least. Maybe this will be the year I finally work it out… just not today
我想我感觉好些了（指的是上上篇报道的大屁股事件）。至少我更愿意承认自己的错误。也许今年我会用心工作，但不是今天

How to attend a conference with extreme social anxiety & inability to handle crowds: attend 3 talks, get drained, panic, crash at hotel room如何与患有极端社交焦虑和交往障碍的人交往？ 参加三个会议，难受，慌乱，最后在酒店房间里崩溃
Searge:Just bumped into @LunarRayGames here at GDC and was able to mention once again how much I would like him to finally finish Time Spinners ;)在GDC会议间撞见了 @LunarRayGames 我在想我跟他说过多少次“我希望你尽快完成时间微调器” ;)

五个小时后...

That was an interesting first day at GDC, now going to finish it with an amazing steak at Morton's steak house.
有趣的一天，GDC的第一天。现在我将前往莫顿牛排馆吃下那美味的牛排。

注: 时间微调器（Time Spinners）是jQueryEasyUI的一个组件
注2: 莫顿牛排馆是一家著名的牛排餐厅

replies.author: langyo
replies.txt_content: 看到开头那句"大屁股事件",差点把刚喝的中药喷桌上XD
